com.metaio.cloud.plugin.data
Class MetaioCloudDataManager

java.lang.Object
  com.metaio.cloud.plugin.data.MetaioCloudDataManager

public class MetaioCloudDataManager
extends java.lang.Object

This class is responsible for all metaioWorldClient operations, downlaoding and caching all remote assets (i.e. 3D models, tracking data, icons etc). It hold the master list of downloaded POIs and current channel that is viewed.
